Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/91st
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Ashland due to, street blockage near Ashland/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th and Ashland due to, street blockage near Ashland/91st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays at Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays at Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
